member.name: T:TurBoLog.OnOutputDebugStringHandler
member.summary: Delegate used when firing DebugMonitor.OnOutputDebug event

member.name: T:TurBoLog.DebugMonitor
member.summary: This class captures all strings passed to OutputDebugString when the application is not debugged.
member.remarks: This class is a port of Microsofts Visual Studio's C++ example "dbmon", which can be found at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/vcsample98/html/vcsmpdbmon.asp.

member.name: E:TurBoLog.DebugMonitor.OnOutputDebugString
member.summary: Fired if an application calls OutputDebugString

member.name: M:TurBoLog.DebugMonitor.Stop
member.summary: Stops this debug monitor. This call we block the executing thread until this debug monitor is stopped.

member.name: M:TurBoLog.DebugMonitor.CreateApplicationException(System.String)
member.summary: Helper to create a new application exception, which has automaticly the last win 32 error code appended.

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
